comment: This class is majority group projects, and the quizzes are online. Attendance is mandatory otherwise you will receive a zero. She is an amazing professor, and you can tell she loves her job. For anyone who is looking for a class to learn in but also stress free, if you already have a heavy workload, I recommend her!

It is annoying how tough of a grader she is, considering the theoretical nature of this class. You are also only graded on a handful of assignments, which makes the other assignments feel redundant. The entire class is based off group collaboration, so there are not many opportunities for personal application assignments/practicums.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Group projects--Graded by few things

comment: shes very nice but this class is extremely boring. All the assignments are group ones and you dont get to pick your teammates. Attendance is mandatory and your grade will be affected if you dont attend. Shes an extremely hard grader which is really annoying bc the class is about concepts and communication. Idk if i would take again

Dr. Osborne was a great teacher, but the class itself is alright. Groupwork throughout the semester, including homework and projects. There is a textbook, but I honestly didn't use it at all. Attendance is mandatory. I didn't like how only 4 of the homework assignments were graded, and we didn't have enough time in class to work on them.

IPE4413. Participation is key. Group work a ton. Tough grader, make sure you use rubric to complete assignments and ask for clarity because she will take points off. Very nice professor, very knowledgeable. There is a group assignment every week. Not a hard class attendance is key.

This class is very group dependent, especially the midterm and the final exam. Professor is amazing at lecturing and engaging with the class, but she is a very picky grader. She does give very specific feedback on how to do better on other assignments. Attendance is absolutely mandatory. Overall, she was a really great and prof as long as you tried
rating_tags: Tough grader--Group projects--Graded by few things

comment: Dr. Osborne was nice, organized and lectures were not boring. All work is group work. You have a midterm and final that is a group. A team presentation that is graded hard. 1min over 10 points off. She doesn't grade on many things, but most of graded hard except voicethread comments each week in the hybrid part of class.  class met weekly.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Group projects--Graded by few things
